website_summaries.verdict: Designed to remove oil without  the use of harsh soap or chemicals.
pros: Gently removes oil from skin while simultaneously moisturizing
Contains  hyaluronic acid to help protect skin's natural moisture
Uses   niacinamide to reduce redness and calm skin
Fragrance free and is great at removing makeup
cons: For those who wear heavy foundation, they may need an extra makeup remover

customer_reviews.title: Instantly clears skin!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on accident( I meant to get the Cetaphil facial cleanser) but I don't REGRET it My skin has cleared up so much just from this soap, it makes my face feel sof and doesn't dry it out so when I follow up with my serum or Rose water and my moisturizer my face feels refreshed and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt feel like CeraVe
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't feel like any CeraVe I've purchased before. Its much thicker and I've broke out with acne more than I have while using the same product but purchased in the store. I don't believe this is the real product. Even when I pump it out of the bottle, I have to press hard on the pump to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks me out
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this for closed comedones. I used it for almost a month and it has absolutely trashed my skin. It lookes totally stripped of any moisture, my pores look huge, I’ve got blackheads and whiteheads in places I never get them. Honestly I look older. The only pro is that it smells nice. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson S. Endebo

customer_reviews.title: Good, gentle foaming cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Oily/combination, sensitive prone, redness prone skin Didn't make my skin mad at me. Mid foaming action, but can get more sudsy with water. I've used this for about five months am and pm and I'm only about halfway through the bottle. I like this enough to finish using the bottle, but not enough to immediately repurchase this. I'm not the biggest foam fan, but I may come back to it if I don't find something close in price I like.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: CeraVe cleanser is pretty much the gold standard for sensitive skin. I've tried a ton of cleanseers, oil cleansers worked well, but were always heavily fragranced and clogged my pores. Traditional cleansers got the job done, but stripped my skin. I started using this, it is fragrance free, removes even my long wear foundation, and doesn't clog my pores. It's been difficult to find the right cleanser that maintains my skins balance and CeraVe is that cleanser. It's not expensive, and the bottle is big enough to last a while so it's and excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Saving grace product
customer_reviews.text: After recently getting on a new birth control, I have suddenly been breaking out with terrible, horrible cystic acne. My oily, sensitive, acne-ridden skin needed help - IMMEDIATELY! This product cured my skin and was my complete savior. My skin was red and bumpy and painful. But now, after two months of using this in the morning and at night, my skin has gone back to how it was before.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Made my face really bumpy, gave me more pimples, and made my face very dry and itchy. (I also used the CeraVe lotion with this on my face) Will not recommend to people with sensitive skin. I used it after watching DrDray on YouTube and thought I’d give it a go. But it really is not worth it. I regret trying it. I used it for a little over a week. Now I am having trouble fixing what it did to my face. I’ve never had such a bad acne problem on my face until now. My forehead was hit the worse. So bumpy. And my skin on my face often is red now.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa S.

customer_reviews.title: A holy grail product for my skin
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser removes makeup and dirt without any squeaky clean feeling; have used it for years and my kids (10 to 26, wide age range) and husband like it, everyone who has tried it has converted. As long as they don't reformulate I will keep buying it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robin in FL

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Mild for Sensitive/Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: I had persistent acne from adolescence to adulthood until a Dermatologist recommended this line of Cerave products to me. I have oily skin, which reacted poorly to all of the products I had been using to control the oil and acne. This cleanser and the day and night time lotions are all I have needed to keep my skin clear and healthy looking over the last few years. Every once in awhile I exfoliate or do a mineral mask, but this cleaner simplifies my life and saves me a ton of money and embarrassment.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for Combination Skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the recommendation of Skincare by Hyram, which is a YouTube channel with skincare advice that I trust. For context, I have combination skin and get a lot of oil around my nose while having dry cheeks. This face wash makes my skin feel very clean without being overly stripped. I use it twice daily and follow it with other products in the morning and evening. It feels great going on, as it almost has a cooling effect. The fact that it has no fragrance makes me feel good about putting it on my face since certain fragrance oils can lead to sensitivity. I will continue to buy this product for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: Good middle of the road cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I’m 30 years old and have fought bad acne my entire life so I’ve tried many different cleansers from the super gentle ones like Cetaphil to prescription ones with harsh chemicals. This is a good middle of the road cleanser. I really feel like it does a good job getting my face clean and removing dirt and makeup (unlike Cetaphil) without drying out my face completely (like the harsh chemical ones). I typically have pretty oily skin and this does a good job of removing the oil without overdrying my skin.
customer_reviews.author: CBAKERD3

customer_reviews.title: Fine product, unsecure packaging
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be working fine on my face (I haven't had it for very long, will update later) but when I received this along with other purchases from Amazon the bottle was open and had spilled all over inside of the box, everything was sticky and the bottle had already had about a 5th emptied. It seems like an okay product, however, the packaging was not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Destiney Houghtalen

customer_reviews.title: Caused me to breakout right away
customer_reviews.text: Well, I like that it has no fragrance and doesn't sting my skin but it caused me a breakout on my nose and chin and I am 40 years old and don't normally break out. Been using for about 5 days, first under-grounder pimple formed after the first night of use the next morning and then several pimples cropped up on my chin as I continued to use it throughout the week. Definitely not using anymore, I'm trying to look better not worse.
customer_reviews.author: Earth For Humanity~

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE FAKE ONE!!! ITS DILUTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the real before, I got it in stores. The real one is extremely thick and lasted me for about 6 months for the 12 oz one. This is very thin, runny, and most likely is diluted. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Washes off and washes clean
customer_reviews.text: OK, I don't know if any of the skin stuff (niacinamide, ceramides, HA) in CeraVe actually works but it's good to know they're there and they don't hurt. Regardless, this cleanser feels good, washes my face clean, and rinses completely off. I have used Cetaphyl for years and like that it cleaned and rinsed off completely too. CeraVe feels like it keeps a little more moisture on my face but I wouldn't rule out going back to Cetaphyl to save a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: MindKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kaboom...
customer_reviews.text: Got the worst luck with products being delivered to me...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cloudy

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I never had problems with acne before until I started using this product. my skin slowly started breaking out. it’s been a month into using this product and my face has tiny, itchy bumps all over it. my face even burns when i sweat now. my cheeks are so irritated, even under my eye lids are slightly inflamed. keep in mind, i don’t suffer from breakouts or acne prone skin, not even when i was a teenager did i have acne. this product isn’t good. i have now stopped using it and already feels relieved. i usually use Aveeno face wash, which i will be using again very soon. please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually very hesitant to buy drug store products because I don't feel like they do anything, however I really like this face wash! I feel like it doesn't strip my skin of its natural oils, it removes make up, and does not bother the PH balance of my skin.... which from my experience, is SUPER hard for a drug store cleanser to do. Either they're to stripping, cause me to break out, or they're too "hydrating" they don't feel like they clean anything. I love this as a dupe!
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe this Foaming Facial Cleanser is belonging to CeraVe family It made my face reddness and swollen and itchy
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for acne prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: My teenager daughter was breaking out a lot as most teenagers do, due to changing hormones. We’ve tried different types of face wash and it didn’t help clear up the acne or help with her oily face. My daughter actually did the research herself and found this product to be healthier for your face due to not having all of the add chemicals. Within 2 weeks, her skin started to clear up, my daughter is happier and have more confidence about her skin. This is our 2nd purchase and I’ve decided to get a bigger bottle so that her sister can use it also.
customer_reviews.author: Payeng Lo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I have to wash my face two times with this every time I shower. That isn't a huge deal to me. It is unscented, which is nice. I like CeraVe products, so I trust this. As far as the oily skin part, I have noticed a little difference in the oiliness of my skin (I have SUPER OILY SKIN... like so bad) but not a huge difference. It does make my skin feel clean, which is the most important for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Be careful even if you don't have sensitive skin...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see what the hype was about cerave so I tried this when my usual face wash was out of stock. This made me break out so bad! I got little red bumps all over my face. I don't even have sensitive skin and I never get breakouts. Immediately after switching back to my usual African black soap, the bumps went away and my skin is normal. I ignored reviews because I don't have sensitive skin, but sometimes, certain brands won't always work for you. Sad this couldn't work for my skin, but it made my face feel clean and the texture was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This facial cleanser was recommended by my dermatologist when I went on accutane a year ago and I haven’t used anything else to wash my face since. It’s super gentle, doesn’t dry out your skin, and you only need a little bit because it foams. I noticed it was quite a bit cheaper on amazon than at Target and have been ordering them from amazon since. The bottle lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I used this last night and it fell so good on my skin I have oily skin and this works for me. It feels light and the ingredients are amazing I love all of cerave products ( I bought a bunch of them !) this combined with cerave all day moisterizer is a great combination . I also use them on my baby and I'm really picky with what I use on his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Esthefany Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash! Best I’ve ever used... however, it arrived opened and the entire box was covered. I understand these are difficult times and I am so grateful to the people risking their lives for us Amazon customers, so I will not ask for a replacement/return. I do see a lot of reviews saying the bottle arrived opened and messy, so maybe think about better ways to package this in the future? Maybe in a tightly sealed bag to keep the top in place?
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my dry, sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This really helped my sensitive skin that gets especially dry in the winter. Mostly the skin on my face gets very dry and flakey and irritated with most every other cleanser. I work around people quite a bit so having a flaking forehead, eyebrows, etc is just embarrassing. After a couple of uses and consistent use (every other day or so) this stuff has changed my skin. It’s awesome. Ten plus years of anxiety and now this has totally helped with a little lotion after. Love it. No scent really that I’ve noticed either.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: So I kept seeing dermatologist on TikTok 😂 using these products and I had to try them because I literally have tried so many different products and nothing worked! I struggled with acne throughout school and now I struggle with blackheads and big pores! This foaming cleanser is freaking amazing! It’s lessen the appearance of my pores dramatically with one wash and the blackheads seem to be disappearing and i don’t have as many as I used to! These products are amazing! I have this foaming wash, moisturizer and retinoid(haven’t used yet lol).
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Gentle foaming facial cleanser, great for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several facial washes and this is my favorite. The foaming cleanser is great at leaving your face clean without over drying it. It is odorless so it's great for sensitive skin. A 16 oz bottle usually lasts me 6-8 months and I wash my face once a day. I find that in the winter my skin is a lot more dry so I need to use lotion after washing my face with this, but in the summer it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Abben H.

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed properly
customer_reviews.text: When my package arrived I noticed that there was slime all over the package and everything else inside. I pick up this face wash to notice it was not completely closed or sealed shut. I had to clean the product off of everything I ordered. And to get a replacement I have to send the face wash back. Dealing with that mess and sending it back does not seem worth all the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Barrack

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This without a doubt is the best line of products for the skin ever created. I came by it by accident while I was clearing out a closet of medical supplies following my mother's death. Rather than toss the unopened bottles I decided to use them. Glad I did. I am a 63-year-old woman and I sware my skin feels like it once did when I was in my twenties. The products are light, non-oily and without a fragrance of their own which will not interfere with any scent, I choose to wear. I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Young

customer_reviews.title: Works for black folks
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to clean my face and it works. Keeps face feeling good
customer_reviews.author: Pimp

customer_reviews.title: CeraVe is great for acne type skin
customer_reviews.text: I found that CeraVe is great for my oily skin. I use it every day in the morning, after I use Medline Remedy Phytoplex Botanical Nutrition for Sensitive Skin. Moisturizer. Since, using these products together I haven't had any acne problems and my skin is improving, greatly. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MindTrue

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and Removes Makeup
customer_reviews.text: I've used this and the CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash, having been given samples of both by my dermatologist. While the Hydrating Wash is not drying, I did not find it to be effective for removing makeup. This cleanser, which lathers, is gentle AND removes makeup. Recently, I've been pairing it with CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, and after only a few days I've noticed an improvement in both the look and feel of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed I wanted to like this product so bad because of all the great reviews. I would not suggest for sensitive skin. Within two days my face was covered in some type of acne rash. My face had been acne free for months and then within two days I have tiny red acne rash bumps all over. Would not suggest buying unfortunately:(
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I dont typically use a foaming cleanser but I got this to use as a second cleanser after an oil cleanser, so I thought foaming could be useful. Its clear and has a thick consistency and it doesnt foam straight out of the bottle, only when you lather it, which I prefer as Im able to transfer into a smaller bottle for travel as well. I definitely dont find it to be moisturizing but no huge complaints. It smells kind of .. medical? sterile?
customer_reviews.author: Tiara McClure

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, neutral, affordable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a scent free, completely neutral daily cleanser that wouldn't strip my skin or empty my bank account. This is that cleanser. It's enough product to last for months, so I feel comfortable using it liberally. It's not the best cleanser I've ever used. It doesn't appear to actively improve the condition of my skin, and I wouldn't expect it to at this price tag. It does clean my skin very well, removing all dirt, makeup, and oil buildup making it a clean canvas for the products I follow it with.
customer_reviews.author: zebrye

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This facial cleaner, for oily skin is absolutely wonderful! I love it just wish I had found it years ago. I have oily skin and work outside so all the dirt in the air gets trapped on my skin resulting in clogged pores. I used it , with not much hope of any positive results, but after about 2 weeks of daily use I could see dramatic positive results to my face. I just ordered a bottle for my daughter. Try it, give it a chance to work. Remember your skin didn’t get in bad shape over night so don’t expect the problem to go away overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Product leaked
customer_reviews.text: I really like this facewash! It does not dry out my skin as much as other products have especially in winter. The only problem I had with this was it leaked in the package. It was wrapped in plastic and approx. 1/4 of the bottle leaked into the surrounding plastic. :( Not a lot of the cleanser is needed to get a good lather, so I should have enough to last me for a while. It was just a complete mess though!
customer_reviews.author: blm

customer_reviews.title: it trashed my face
customer_reviews.text: i used this facial cleanser for a while and it seemed to get rid of the few zits i had, but after using it for a bout two months i noticed my pores getting large, and i had blackheads on my nose, and whiteheads on my forehead and chin. This cleanser did not help my face, so i went for a more natural soap bar and used moisturizer. Now my face looks a lot smoother and clear. i think going to the more natural stuff was the safer choice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Theis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you want clean skin without drying.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really cleans well without drying out your skin. I’ve used it for a couple of years and while I’m pretty fickle about sticking to skin products, this one has been a mainstay for me. I’ve tried using other face washes but find a lot of dirt and makeup still on my skin after I rinse... not with this cleanser though. It’s a really good product... highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KIS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 3 years now. I really like how easy it is to use. The pump makes it easy to dispense the right amount and it cleans well. I have not experienced dryness and my skin stays healthy. One bottle lasts about 3 to 4 months and I use it everyday. So there is value even though the cost seems high.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Having been used this face wash for years now I can confidently say I will never change brands. This specific face wash is amazing for my type of skin where I get oily in my T-Zone and need something to help wash off the oil before I moisturize again. Being non-scented is fantastic and it’s not too drying on the skin as it can be used daily as long as you moisturize afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Barcenas

customer_reviews.title: Really good for acne in oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Although whenever I have certain food my acne is bad, with this soap my acne is being regulated. I used this soap twice a day (day and night) and it has been helping my acne considerably!! I really recommend this product for people who have tried several products for acne in oily skin. After using this soap, I recommend applying some sort of humidifying cream/lotion for oily skin. In my case, this soap dries a bit my skin which makes my skin to produce more oil and therefore have more chances of having acne. However, this is solved by applying the cream after the soap use.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Olmedo

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: pros cleans your face easy to use and wash off feel clean after cons did nothing at all to clear up my face bottle was open on arrival but hardly anything leaked out wont get again I just feel its a good face wash. IT did nothing to actually clear it up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C. King

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Really great for my oily skin I’ve used Curology in the past but I didn’t want to keep paying 60 dollars for there cleanser, acne treatment and moisturizer so I got this instead to replace the cleanser and it’s works just as great but Make sure to wash the cleanser out good cause I only use half a pump and when I put on my serums the leftover cleanser on my face starts to foam again so make sure you wash it all off
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple years now. I wash my face with it 2 times a day. I used to have pretty oily skin but since I started regularly using this my skin has balanced out more and now does not get as oily throughout my day. It's not scented which I like (since I have sensitive skin), and it lathers and rinses easily. It's a great price and a great product. Love the easy dispenser as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy  hennes

customer_reviews.title: Omg yes
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes yes! I recently found Cerave due to dermatologist reviews on TikTok and I am not disappointed! I’ve always had oily, acne-prone skin and Cerave has shown me it was also super sensitive. These products are so gentle but work very well. I am still going through the purge (getting rid of all the gross stuff that was under the skin) but can already tell a big difference in my skin texture. 12/10
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Reid

customer_reviews.title: Good cost for effective product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used Obagi, my dermatologist recommended.... but it cost a bit more. Found this cleanser and it has worked very well. My skin care routine may be different from others and most likely is. At night I wash my face clean with this cleanser and wash cloth. Then I go back over with Clarisonic and same cleanser. I feel any cleansing brush would work. But my system is not going to work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jemanij

customer_reviews.title: Good for really oily skins
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is not a foaming cleanser, I don't know why they advertise it as such. Second, contrary to what most of the reviewers have written, my skin does dry out after I use this product. I have a mix skin (prone to get oily), so it's not dry naturally, but especially my checks feel dry and need tons of moisturizer after I use this. The good thing is that I believe that this cleanser does a good job cleaning the makeup residues.
customer_reviews.author: Fiori

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and switched from Aveeno to this and it burned my skin and even after it was wiped out and I scrubbed my face it continued to burn for the rest of the night. I haven’t used it since this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff! I had a bout of unexplained psoriasis on my face, it was super unusual, never had it before. My skin was so dry it felt like sand paper and would crack when I moved my face around. I bought this and when combined with 2 other cerave products, it cleared right up and hasn't returned! I use this every morning and night, even my 11 year old daughter uses it to control her hormonal pre teen acne.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My Holy Grail Facewash
customer_reviews.text: Love CeraVe's products! This is my go-to face wash. I have combination skin, leaning a bit more towards oily (especially in the hotter months). This wash is gentle, doesn't break me out (or bother my seb. dermatitis), and is effective. I love the larger size!
customer_reviews.author: SWC

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my PCP, she was right!
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues with adult acne for my entire adult life (10+ years) and have tried lots of expensive, high-end remedies to clear my skin up. I was skeptical when my doctor recommended this inexpensive, convenience-store brand, but she was absolutely right. I use this in combination with CeraVe facial lotion and my skin is the clearest it's been in 10 years. I recommend it to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Get it, try it out!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash!!! It’s the best face wash I have ever tried. It’s not drying at all. I always thought as a oily skin girl u needed a drying face wash. Not the case. It has helped clearing up with my skin and has a great value for your buck. Very inexpensive for the amount of product that’s in the bottle. This has been a great addition to my skin routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jackieohhh

customer_reviews.title: Strange but amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for sensitive skin. My skin breaks out extremely easily and gets so red. Curology actually recommended the product because their cleanser was not working for me. The texture was hard for me to get used to because I love products that foam, it gives me a strange sense of knowing my skin is clean. This product is more of like a body gel type of feeling but does amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Skin
customer_reviews.text: As I've gotten older, I've realized that I need a regular face wash. This one works great and leaves my skin feel so soft and clean. I remember watching a video on YouTube that said some people overwash their skin and end up looking dewy or shiny. This definitely doesn't do either of those. It helps my skin to feel more normal after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Venus Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face wash. I bought a cheaper knock off once for vacation and I broke out and my skin felt gross. This is great for sensitive skin so it is great for my whole family. My skin feels so clean. And cheaper on Amazon than in store. I have psoriasis and my daughters have sensitive skin this works well for all of us. I highly recommend this product and I won't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast results in reducing redness and oil
customer_reviews.text: CeraVe for oily skin is terrific. Have used it for a week now and am seeing results. Redness is diminished greatly (nose and cheek). Pores on nose reduced. Overall, less oil and redness. Just a pearl sized drop is needed. It lathers up incredibly well, so take your time and work it into your skin and pores. Have struggled with oil and redness my whole like and finally found something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allergies
customer_reviews.text: The project did its job in cleaning my face and getting rid of the oils but these dark spots started to form on my face after I first started using the project. My face felt it was on fire! I'm giving it three stars for doing it's job but my gosh it was such a horrible experience!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani C.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for very acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is super sensitive, my face was dry and itchy from my usual acne face wash. I thought CeraVe would be just the thing to give my face a break. Even though this is for sensitive skin and non comedogenic (won’t cause pimples) I started Breaking out really bad almost right away. I guess My skin is really that sensitive. I cant Use it at all. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: CHeryl C Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE QUALITY BAD FOR ME PERSONALLY
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a personal opinion than a review on the quality of the facial cleanser. Nice smell, nice quality. My big problem is I am prone to eczema and this facial cleanser really sets it off even though I put lotion on right after my shower. I gave the rest to my mother and she really likes it for her skin. If you don't have eczema you will probably really like this facial cleanser. My mom and I both have oily skin and it helps control that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cleanser
customer_reviews.text: My friend who is all about Korean skin care made me a list of products to buy to fix my face and this was one of them. I love this stuff. I used to use more aggressive cleansers like Neutrogena and always felt like they were too harsh but the gentle stuff left my face feeling dirty. This is right in the middle and I'm a happy happy girl.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Removes make up
customer_reviews.text: I use it at night with a silicone scrubby thing and it removes all my face make-up and I just have to go over my waterproof mascara with remover. My face isn't tight after. I still moisturize, but after some face wash my skin looks dry- not with this. No acne flare ups although I still use an acne face wash in the AM.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Product did not foam up.
customer_reviews.text: I been using this product for years now because of my oily skin. It works great for oily acne prone skin! Unfortunately this product did not foam up at all. I tried a couple of pumps while using this and nothing, I was really disappointed. There has to be something with this formula because it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: xGreen17x

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: What a great cleanser! My dermatologist told me about this product, and after trying her sample I knew I wanted to continue using this. My skin is normal and I’ve always used Dove cleansing bar, but lately my eyes were always irritated and I eliminated makeup products to no avail. After using this cleanser , I bet it was the Dove. I like how clean but not tight it makes my skin feel. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Fairoaks

customer_reviews.title: MADE ACNE WORSE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. I have breakouts here and there and decided to try this product because of its reviews, and the fact that it was way cheaper than other products. But this only made me to break out worse. Instead of having one problem area my entire face is now breaking out and getting worse everyday. My face has never been this bad for years and within a week of using this paired with its moisturizer, my face looks terrible. RETURNING THIS AND GOING BACK TO PROACTIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't put this aside your hand soap!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 2-month and it is good for cleaning my face as a pre-step. However, it really feels and looks like hand soap. Today I tried to use it as usual after I took off my glasses. I applied some on my face and it was my hand soap instead of this facial cleanser......
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Chai

customer_reviews.title: The best face wash
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily skin and this cleanser CUTs the grease down instantly. My skin is so oily I have to wash it several times a day otherwise I will break out due to clogged pores- not to mention I work out often and have to wash my face after each workout. Despite all this face washing, this product never dries out my skin and my breakouts have been more controlled than ever with this in my routine. I highly recommend. I will repurchase this cleanser when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle C

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of these guys who don't like to change something they use. But with this product I've decided to give it a try since it comes at a very reasonable price. To my surprise it worked fabulously with for my face. I strongly advise those who have oily skin and used to fancy wash products to give this one a try. It might not be pricey, but it sure works as one!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: The best face wash there is
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive, acne-prone skin so its difficult to find something mild but also cleansing. This cleanser is perfect. I used to buy it at Target but this big value bottle costs the same if not less than the price in store so I started buying it online. I also use their moisturizer with SPF 30 and their night moisturizer as well. Love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Rola Hamade

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good for both sensitive and or oily skin. Make it your face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap! Thank you skin care addiction on Reddit for the introduction! Oily skin? Check. Use daily? Check. Sensitive skin? Check. Actually clean, refreshing skin? Check. No harsh crap causing redness or excessive drying? Check. Clean, fresh look all day? Check. Heavy oil and need morning and evening wash? Check - and start evening washing now if you don't already, you heathen! I use the Cerave daily moisturizing lotion as well. Clean, clear, vibrant, healthy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Couch

customer_reviews.title: The Best Face Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This was suggested by my eye doctor to remove all the make-up. And it does. It's smooth, not drying. It removes all the dirt & oils from the makeup. I use a micro face cloth as well, and the combo is amazing. I was using expensive name brands, but this is so much cheaper & just as good, if not better.
customer_reviews.author: MjT

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Not something to buy shipped. The product leaked all over the bag and box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite drugstore cleanser. It's on par with some of the more expensive ones and I swear it's a dupe for the Drunk Elephant Beste gel cleanser. It's nonstripping, lathers well, and removes the gunk without drying out my skin. I have normal-combo skin, and this works as a day or night cleanser. From the ingredients to the price point, there's nothing I would change about it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Huang

customer_reviews.title: CAN CAUSE ACNE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had completely clear skin but usually there’s only a blemish or two at a time. This product made my entire chin and jawline break out. I used it for over a full week in case it was “clearing out” my skinny and actually working. There was more acne every day and the day I stopped using it I stopped getting new acne. WATCH OUT if acne begins when you start using this
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great Universal Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is really good for all skin types. It's light enough of a cleanser to be used at morning and night and is super easy to apply and wash off. If you're not sure your skin type or what cleanser to buy, this is an easy solution.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: So smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive combo skin. The cleaner that I had been using for years started to feel too drying to I wanted to get a creamy kind. This feels amazing while cleaning my face, like I’m cleaning with a lotion nice and smooth yet cleansing. Leaves my face feeling incredibly smooth. Works great for my oily large pore skin.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle, great for oily or dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good face wash for anyone with flaky or dry skin! Usually face wash makes my skin feel too tight and too polished. This one is really gentle and has a nice foam to it. It also has no scent which is great (why put perfume on your face?). Its gentle enough that I can very gently use it on my eyelids to remove any remaining makeup. I recommend buying the larger size, it lasts me the entire year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Currently used the new cleanser for two months. It is suitable for my sensitive skin. My skin was uncomfortable at that time, but I can use it for daily cleaning and not feeling bad. This cleanser can remove dirt and oil so gently and that is what I need. The cleaning effect is better than Cetaphil.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this face wash, I tend to have oily/combo skin and this makes my face feel super clean without being over drying. I have sensitive skin and haven't had any problems with this product. Thankfully this product is scent free so it doesn't cause any skin irritation and it's sharable both me and my fiance use it nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and effective
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Clean & Clear Foaming Cleanser, but this is so much better! I started looking for a new cleanser that didn't dry my face out as bad as the Clean & Clear did. This CeraVe cleanser feels very moisturizing yet my face feels clean. I use it every night to wash my face and remove makeup. Very glad I switched.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for sensitive or oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I searched online and I discovered a product that helps with my acne. I apply this product in the morning and in the evening. After washing my face and applying the product, it picks up all the dirt and grime. It leaves my face feeling smooth without excess oil being showed. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Acne problems? You found your solution!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely everything everyone talks about! My acne has decreased soo much by using this when I shower, take makeup off, before bed, or even just want a clean face. I guarantee your acne will reduce when you using this product consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sedano

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and acne prone skin. I can't use anything anymore that is scented. This works great for my face and for an all over soap. I'm very pleased with it. No skin irritations at all. I highly recommend it. I had a little trouble with it drying my face out in the beginning. It seems to have settled down now.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: great face wash
customer_reviews.text: Saw this product so I got it. I will never go back to any other brand or face wash. This one is gentle and has cleared up my skin. There is really no smell to it. My skin is SUPER oily and this has helped so much with oil control. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Peters

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin feeling nice and clean. Improves tone and acne breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I started using this product my skin's condition has improved tremendously. I have a more even tone, almost zero breakouts, and even a glow. Leaves my skin feeling and looking soft and clean. I recommend this. I have really sensitive skin as well, and I've had no issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Makes you break out in cystic acne!!! Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 3 months and didn’t realize it was the sole reason my face broke out in cystic acne. I stopped using it and it began to clear up within a day. Do not buy, it will make you break out badly. I had never had acne this bad in my life!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave F

customer_reviews.title: Packaging suckssssssssss
customer_reviews.text: Here’s hoping this next shipment comes not like this!! Was so excited to use this and almost half the bottle is gone and the top is broken. Sending it back hoping second time is the charm.
customer_reviews.author: jupiterco

customer_reviews.title: A MUST
customer_reviews.text: I (scott's daughter) have been using this for two days and my skins already so much better. I sometimes get little bumps on the side of my face and after two days of using this there slowly going away. I have sensitive skin and this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Superior Dermatological Benefits
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin feeling improved in condition. Beneficial ingredients: ceramides, niacinamide (non-foaming version doesn’t currently have this), hyaluronic acid. For dry or oily skin. All this company’s products (I use several) are top-notch and will improve skin condition & appearance. Unscented is ideal. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SKallen

customer_reviews.title: it's decent
customer_reviews.text: the part I dislike is the smell but I understand because no fragrance is good but I think they should at least add natural ingredients. I'm not sure if I got any improvements but it does keep your skin from not flipping out. You just need to wash your face everyday or else there's no point. It actually does moisturizing to your skin especially flaky skin.
customer_reviews.author: Wonyi choi

customer_reviews.title: Great as a cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something scent free for sensitive skin. And this has been really great for me. BUT if you’re looking for something that is actually super foaming, this isn’t probably what you’re looking for. And I always use a moisturizer after i use this because I don’t feel like it’s very moisturizing. But I do really like it as a cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Moore

customer_reviews.title: The best facial product I've used
customer_reviews.text: I have always had problems with acne. This product came recommended from a skin care consultant after a facial. Within 1 month, this and the Cerave lotion, cleared my acne and has continued to be the best cleanser I've used. One bottle lasts for about 3 months. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K. Bates

customer_reviews.title: A fave!
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance-free, mild, super-effective, bottle lasts forever? So many reasons I keep coming back to this stuff! It’s a winner on every level! Other stuff has cuter packaging, but this just works and works at an awesome price point.
customer_reviews.author: maryamelia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and every facial cleanser just dries me out even more but.....this is the only one that doesn't do that! My face feels hydrated and clean and wonderful when I'm done using it. Someone recommended this and it's been everything I'd hoped for. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Collins

customer_reviews.title: Favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a day. I struggle with cystic acne and very sensitive skin. This is the best face wash I have ever been able to find. Came in well packaged shipping materials so no leaks or problems. I will certainly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Stumf

customer_reviews.title: I would die for CeraVe
customer_reviews.text: CeraVe is a great brand all around. I have an oily T zone and sometimes on my chin area, and this cleanser has really helped me control my oily skin in a matter of two weeks. I highly recommend also pairing this with a CeraVe moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Jukic

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent and gentle cleanser for my sensitive skin. I would highly recommend this to people with sensitive / oily skin. It effectively cleans but does not dry or irritate my skin. I will use this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best face wash I have ever used! I have been using this face wash for about a year and have been so happy to find it leaves my skin feeling clean, moisturizes, and does not cause irritation or breakout. The fragrance free is truly fragrance free, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: An affordable & effective product!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser personally works for me. I recommend to anyone make sure you know your skin type before buying. Just because this may work for someone doesn't mean it will work for you, & vice versa! Definitely try another CerAve cleanser if this particular one doesn't seem to work for you. It personally works for my oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Amo

product_meta.title: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | Makeup Remover and Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | 16 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description:
Size:16 Fl Oz

Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser has a unique formula with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) that cleanses and removes oil without disrupting the protective skin barrier. Gentle foaming action refreshes and cleanses skin, including removing excess oils and makeup.

 * Non-comedogenic
 * Non-drying
 * Non-irritating
 * Ideal for normal to oily skin



Key Ingredients:

 * Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
 * Hyaluronic acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
 * Niacinamide: Helps repair a compromised skin barrier while improving the appearance of the skin.
feature_bullets: [ FOAMING CLEANSER ] Dispenses as a clear gel cleanser and transforms into a foam as you lather. Cleanses without leaving skin feeling tight, dry, or stripped

[ ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for different skin types, including dry skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more
[ DAILY FACE WASH ] Fragrance-free, non-comedogenic, non-drying, and non-irritating. Gently refreshes and effectively removes excess oil, dirt, and makeup
[ FACE & BODY WASH ] Cleanser for face, can also be used on the body and/or hands. Suitable for normal to oily skin
